main event: A witness observed an unidentified aerial object hovering close to the ground in Fort Worth, Texas on June 24, 1955.
interesting points: The object was approximately 50 feet in diameter and hovered about 80-100 feet above the ground.
The object was observed for about 20 minutes, during which time it was almost motionless, except for some slight up and down movements.
At one point, the object shot straight up at a very high speed and then stopped suddenly.
The object had a brilliant greenish-white color and appeared to have portholes or openings around it.
The object suddenly accelerated and shot off to the east at a fantastic speed, disappearing from sight in a matter of seconds.
